eclectic.translation[0].definitions[0].d: including a mixture of many different things or people, especially so that you can use the best of all of them
eclectic.translation[0].definitions[0].e: galleries with an eclectic range of styles and artists
an eclectic mixture of 18th- and 19th-century furniture
eclectic.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who chooses the best or most useful parts from many different ideas, methods etc
